AzureBlade: So be it. I propose a challenge then. Your spark against 
mine. What do you think of it?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nightstrike:::
> 
> "IF YOU DON'T STOP TO CALL ME CONDOR, I WON'T ANSWER ANY OF YOUR 
> QUESTIONS, YOU GET IT!!!!"roared Nightstrike"I'm not weak... I don't 
> like to be weak, ruled by stupid and opressive honor code... "he 
> added with sarcasm "Haven't you noticed that a smart decepticon can 
> play using your honor??? that happened before, remeber the great 
war, 
> remember Galvatron... I din't loose power as Decepticon, I'm 
> here 'cause I liked chew over to ponder... and you must know that 
I'm 
> not afraid to my doom...I'm not coward... "
> 
> 
>
